PerfectNetExp.abs: 有影响的;有势力的 Eg. It helps to have influential friends. 交上几个有权势的朋友很有好处。 adv. influentially 有影响地;有力地 n. influence 影响.

auth_sentence.content: Mike Phillips Started the Six Nations ponderously, but ended it influentially on Saturday.
